6
7// DisplayCGL.h: CGL implementation of egl::Display
8
9#ifndef LIBANGLE_RENDERER_GL_CGL_DISPLAYCGL_H_
10#define LIBANGLE_RENDERER_GL_CGL_DISPLAYCGL_H_
11
12#include <thread>
13#include <unordered_set>
14
15#include "libANGLE/renderer/gl/DisplayGL.h"
16
17struct _CGLContextObject;
18typedef _CGLContextObject *CGLContextObj;
19
20struct _CGLPixelFormatObject;
21typedef _CGLPixelFormatObject *CGLPixelFormatObj;
22
23namespace rx
24{
25
26class WorkerContext;
27
28struct EnsureCGLContextIsCurrent : angle::NonCopyable
29{
30 public:
31 EnsureCGLContextIsCurrent(CGLContextObj context);
32 ~EnsureCGLContextIsCurrent();
33
34 private:
35 CGLContextObj mOldContext;
36 bool mResetContext;
37};
38
39class DisplayCGL : public DisplayGL
40{
41 public:
42 DisplayCGL(const egl::DisplayState &state);
43 ~DisplayCGL() override;
44
45 egl::Error initialize(egl::Display *display) override;
46 void terminate() override;
47 egl::Error prepareForCall() override;
48 egl::Error releaseThread() override;
49
50 egl::Error makeCurrent(egl::Display *display,
51 egl::Surface *drawSurface,
52 egl::Surface *readSurface,
53 gl::Context *context) override;
54
55 SurfaceImpl *createWindowSurface(const egl::SurfaceState &state,
56 EGLNativeWindowType window,
57 const egl::AttributeMap &attribs) override;
58 SurfaceImpl *createPbufferSurface(const egl::SurfaceState &state,
59 const egl::AttributeMap &attribs) override;
60 SurfaceImpl *createPbufferFromClientBuffer(const egl::SurfaceState &state,
61 EGLenum buftype,
62 EGLClientBuffer clientBuffer,
63 const egl::AttributeMap &attribs) override;
64 SurfaceImpl *createPixmapSurface(const egl::SurfaceState &state,
65 NativePixmapType nativePixmap,
66 const egl::AttributeMap &attribs) override;
67
68 ContextImpl *createContext(const gl::State &state,
69 gl::ErrorSet *errorSet,
70 const egl::Config *configuration,
71 const gl::Context *shareContext,
72 const egl::AttributeMap &attribs) override;
73
74 egl::ConfigSet generateConfigs() override;
75
76 bool testDeviceLost() override;
77 egl::Error restoreLostDevice(const egl::Display *display) override;
78
79 bool isValidNativeWindow(EGLNativeWindowType window) const override;
80 egl::Error validateClientBuffer(const egl::Config *configuration,
81 EGLenum buftype,
82 EGLClientBuffer clientBuffer,
83 const egl::AttributeMap &attribs) const override;
84
85 DeviceImpl *createDevice() override;
86
87 std::string getVendorString() const override;
88
89 egl::Error waitClient(const gl::Context *context) override;
90 egl::Error waitNative(const gl::Context *context, EGLint engine) override;
91
92 gl::Version getMaxSupportedESVersion() const override;
93
94 CGLContextObj getCGLContext() const;
95 CGLPixelFormatObj getCGLPixelFormat() const;
96
97 WorkerContext *createWorkerContext(std::string *infoLog);
98
99 void initializeFrontendFeatures(angle::FrontendFeatures *features) const override;
100
101 void populateFeatureList(angle::FeatureList *features) override;
102
103 // Support for dual-GPU MacBook Pros. Used only by ContextCGL. The use of
104 // these entry points is gated by the presence of dual GPUs.
105 egl::Error referenceDiscreteGPU();
106 egl::Error unreferenceDiscreteGPU();
107 egl::Error handleGPUSwitch() override;
108
109 private:
110 egl::Error makeCurrentSurfaceless(gl::Context *context) override;
111
112 void generateExtensions(egl::DisplayExtensions *outExtensions) const override;
113 void generateCaps(egl::Caps *outCaps) const override;
114
115 void checkDiscreteGPUStatus();
116
117 std::shared_ptr<RendererGL> mRenderer;
118
119 egl::Display *mEGLDisplay;
120 CGLContextObj mContext;
121 std::unordered_set<std::thread::id> mThreadsWithCurrentContext;
122 CGLPixelFormatObj mPixelFormat;
123 bool mSupportsGPUSwitching;
124 uint64_t mCurrentGPUID;
125 CGLPixelFormatObj mDiscreteGPUPixelFormat;
126 int mDiscreteGPURefs;
127 // This comes from the ANGLE platform's DefaultMonotonicallyIncreasingTime. If the discrete GPU
128 // is unref'd for the last time, this is set to the time of that last unref. If it isn't
129 // activated again in 10 seconds, the discrete GPU pixel format is deleted.
130 double mLastDiscreteGPUUnrefTime;
131 bool mDeviceContextIsVolatile = false;
132};
133
134} // namespace rx
135
136#endif // LIBANGLE_RENDERER_GL_CGL_DISPLAYCGL_H_
137
